title.narrative: Al 2024, las instituciones que forman parte del Sistema Nacional de Proteccion de la Ni?ez adoptan una cultura de gestion y uso delconocimiento, para que los tomadores de decision cuenten con evidencia la necesaria, capaz de orientar el desarrollo de programas,politicas y planes en ni?ez y adolescencia pertinentes y oportunos.

description.narrative: UNICEF has strengthened the local coordination mechanisms of the Social Protection System and has started the implementation of its communication strategy, resulting in an increased access to services. In addition, collaboration with academia and civil society actors has promoted child protection research and innovative system-improving proposals. | Status:Met | As-of Date:13/01/2022
